description.value:
The reality you conjure is much brighter than your own. The area of your quantum field becomes bright light. Creatures in your quantum field must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|against:class] save against your class DC; creatures with light blindness treat their result as one step worse.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled for 1 minute. The creature can spend an Interact action rubbing its eyes to end this blinded condition.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature can't use an Interact action to end the blinded condition.
